Interface RichTextConverter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the conversion target type
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnsiConverter, AttributeBasedConverter, HtmlConverter, StyledDocumentConverter, TagBasedConverter
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface RichTextConverter<T>
Interface for RichText converters.
